SHPE Position

President

About Me

Finishing the last year of a Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering. Focusing in Digital Design and Renewable Power Systems. This is my second year as President of the UNT SHPE chapter and look forward to an amazing year.

Background

  • Hometown - Era, TX
  • B.S. in Electrical Engineering at the University of North Texas
  • Era High School Valedictorian
  • First Generation Student

Skills

  • VHDL, Verilog, MATLAB, R, and C++
  • Mentoring, Tutoring, and Leadership

Current Career Interests

Developing faster processors with lower power consumption by using reconfigurable computing.

Future Goals

  • Take 20 plus members to the SHPE National Convention
  • Recruit over 30 new members
  • Obtain a full time offer by the time I graduate
